overview: As Director of Internet Marketing for ParableSoft, Patty has the responsibility of managing both the company’s overall Marketing strategy and all clients’ Internet Marketing strategies. With years of experience in Sales and Marketing, along with formal education in Advertising, Patty brings an extensive amount of knowledge, experience, and passion for the Internet Marketing industry to ParableSoft. Patty’s intersts along with Internet Marketing include NASCAR, movies, and boating.
